wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： 2015-05-25： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2015-05-26： 厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开 2015-06-05： 细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开 2015-06-15： 细节向普通白帽子公开 2015-06-25： 细节向实习白帽子公开 2015-07-10： 细节向公众公开 简要描述： 众泰汽车某站弱口令 详细说明： HTTP Weak Passwordhttp://61.153.250.106:8083/manager/html http password is admin/admin Apache Struts2 Multi-Remote Code Executionhttp://61.153.250.106:8080/factory_index.action HTTP Weak Passwordhttp://61.153.250.108:8082/manager/html http password is admin/adminhttp://61.153.250.108:8083/manager/html http password is admin/admin OGNL consolefind ognl console:http://61.153.250.106:88//struts/webconsole.htmlfind ognl console:http://61.153.250.106:8083//struts/webconsole.htmlfind ognl console:http://61.153.250.106:8080//struts/webconsole.htmlfind ognl console:http://61.153.250.106:8082//struts/webconsole.html 漏洞证明： http://61.153.250.108:8083/manager/html http password is admin/admin 修复方案： 修改密码 版权声明：转载请注明来源 随页清风@乌云
